name: BillingAccountId
description: Unique identifier assigned to a billing account by the provider (invoice issuer). Maps to GCP billing account ID, AWS payer account ID, or SaaS account ID.

name: BillingAccountName
description: Display name assigned to a billing account by the provider.

name: BillingAccountType
description: Provider-specific label for the type of billing account (e.g., Enterprise Agreement, Pay-As-You-Go, Reseller).

name: SubAccountId
description: Unique identifier for a grouping of resources (sub-account). Maps to org_slug for tenant isolation. Used for access control and cost allocation.

name: SubAccountName
description: Display name of the sub-account/tenant organization.

name: SubAccountType
description: Provider-specific sub-account type. Examples: 'Organization', 'Project', 'Subscription'.

name: AllocatedMethodId
description: Unique identifier for the allocation method used for splitting a shared charge in data generator-calculated cost allocation.

name: AllocatedMethodDetails
description: Information about how a cost was allocated when usage records are split (JSON object with allocation details like ratio, basis, rule name).

name: AllocatedResourceId
description: Identifier of the resource to which a portion of cost is allocated in a split cost allocation.

name: AllocatedResourceName
description: Display name of the resource to which cost is allocated in a split cost allocation.

name: AllocatedTags
description: Tags (key-value pairs) assigned to the allocated charge's resources in a split cost allocation (JSON object of tags relevant to the allocated portion).

name: BilledCost
description: The charge amount used as the basis for invoicing, inclusive of all usage-based discounts (excluding upfront prepayments). This is the actual invoiced amount.

name: BillingCurrency
description: ISO 4217 currency code that the charge was billed in (e.g., USD, EUR, INR). Must match org's default_currency.

name: BillingPeriodStart
description: Inclusive start date and time of the billing period for the charge. ISO 8601 format.

name: BillingPeriodEnd
description: Exclusive end date and time of the billing period for the charge. ISO 8601 format.

name: CapacityReservationId
description: Identifier assigned to a capacity reservation by the provider (if the charge is related to reserved capacity).

name: CapacityReservationStatus
description: Indicates whether the charge represents consumption of a capacity reservation or unused reserved capacity. Values: 'Used', 'Unused'.

name: ChargeCategory
description: Highest-level classification based on how it is billed. Values: 'Usage', 'Purchase', 'Tax', 'Credit', 'Adjustment', 'Subscription'.

name: ChargeClass
description: Indicates if the row is a correction or adjustment from a previous billing period. Values: 'Correction', null (for non-adjustments).

name: ChargeDescription
description: Self-contained summary of the charge's purpose and price. Human-readable description for cost transparency.

name: ChargeFrequency
description: How often the charge occurs. Values: 'One-Time', 'Recurring', 'Usage-Based'.

name: ChargePeriodStart
description: Inclusive start date and time of the charge period (the specific usage period). ISO 8601 format. Used as partition field.

name: ChargePeriodEnd
description: Exclusive end date and time of the charge period. ISO 8601 format.

name: CommitmentDiscountCategory
description: Whether the commitment-based discount is based on usage quantity ('Usage') or cost/spend ('Spend').

name: CommitmentDiscountId
description: Unique identifier for a commitment-based discount (e.g., Savings Plan ID, Reserved Instance ID, CUD ID).

name: CommitmentDiscountName
description: Display name of the commitment-based discount.

name: CommitmentDiscountQuantity
description: Amount of the commitment purchased or applied (in units of the commitment discount). For discount-related rows.

name: CommitmentDiscountStatus
description: Whether the row represents consumption of a commitment or unused portion. Values: 'Used', 'Unused'.

name: CommitmentDiscountType
description: Provider-assigned label for the commitment type. Examples: 'Reserved Instance', 'Savings Plan', 'CUD', 'EDP'.

name: CommitmentDiscountUnit
description: Unit of measure for commitment discount quantity (e.g., 'Hours', 'GB', 'USD'). Corresponds to CommitmentDiscountQuantity.

name: ConsumedQuantity
description: The volume of resource/service usage measured, in units specified by ConsumedUnit. The raw usage quantity for the SKU.

name: ConsumedUnit
description: The measurement unit for consumed usage (e.g., 'GB-hours', 'Requests', 'Tokens', 'Seats', 'vCPU-hours').

name: ContractApplied
description: Properties associating this charge with contract commitments (JSON with ContractId, ContractCommitmentId references). Links to contract_commitment_1_3 table.

name: ContractedCost
description: Cost calculated by multiplying contracted unit price by PricingQuantity. The agreed-upon cost excluding commitment-based discounts.

name: ContractedUnitPrice
description: The agreed-upon unit price per PricingUnit, inclusive of negotiated discounts (except commitment-based discounts).

name: EffectiveCost
description: The effective cost after all applicable discounts and amortized upfront payments. This is the true cost for FinOps analysis.

name: HostProviderName
description: Name of the entity providing the underlying infrastructure (the host platform/cloud). Examples: 'Google Cloud', 'AWS', 'Azure', 'Self-Hosted'.

name: InvoiceId
description: Unique identifier of the invoice on which this charge appears.

name: InvoiceIssuerName
description: Name of the entity responsible for issuing the invoice (the billing entity). Could be the provider or a reseller.

name: ListCost
description: Cost calculated by multiplying list unit price by PricingQuantity. The charge at published list rates before any discounts.

name: ListUnitPrice
description: The provider's list (undiscounted) unit price per PricingUnit of the SKU.

name: PricingCategory
description: The pricing model used. Values: 'On-Demand', 'Reserved', 'Spot', 'Preemptible', 'Subscription', 'Committed Use'.

name: PricingCurrency
description: The currency in which pricing columns are denominated (original pricing currency, if different from BillingCurrency).

name: PricingCurrencyContractedUnitPrice
description: Contracted unit price per PricingUnit in the original pricing currency (for multi-currency scenarios).

name: PricingCurrencyEffectiveCost
description: Effective cost in the original pricing currency after all discounts and amortization.

name: PricingCurrencyListUnitPrice
description: List unit price per PricingUnit in the original pricing currency (undiscounted rate).

name: PricingQuantity
description: The quantity of the SKU used after applying pricing schemas like tiering or block sizing. Often derived from ConsumedQuantity.

name: PricingUnit
description: The unit of measure for pricing (how usage is billed after pricing rules). Examples: '100 requests', '1 hour', 'GB-month'.

name: ProviderName
description: [DEPRECATED in FOCUS 1.3] Use ServiceProviderName and HostProviderName instead. Kept for backward compatibility.

name: PublisherName
description: [DEPRECATED in FOCUS 1.3] Use ServiceProviderName instead. Previously used for third-party publishers in marketplace scenarios.

name: RegionId
description: Provider-assigned identifier for the geographic region/zone. Examples: 'us-central1', 'us-east-1', 'global'.

name: RegionName
description: Human-readable name of the geographic region. Examples: 'Iowa', 'N. Virginia', 'Global'.

name: ResourceId
description: Unique identifier of the resource that incurred the charge. Examples: VM instance ID, subscription ID, storage bucket name.

name: ResourceName
description: Display name of the resource that incurred the charge.

name: ResourceType
description: The type/category of resource. Examples: 'Virtual Machine', 'Storage Bucket', 'SaaS Subscription', 'API Call'.

name: ServiceCategory
description: Highest-level classification based on core function. Values: 'Compute', 'Storage', 'Database', 'Networking', 'AI/ML', 'SaaS', 'Support', 'Other'.

name: ServiceName
description: Name of the specific service or offering. Examples: 'Compute Engine', 'Cloud Storage', 'ChatGPT Plus', 'Slack Business+'.

name: ServiceProviderName
description: Name of the entity that provides the service (the seller). Examples: 'Google Cloud', 'OpenAI', 'Anthropic', 'Slack', 'Canva'.

name: ServiceSubcategory
description: Secondary classification within ServiceCategory. Examples: 'General Purpose VM', 'Object Storage', 'Team Plan', 'API Usage'.

name: SkuId
description: Unique identifier for the SKU (stock keeping unit) representing a set of pricing properties for the service.

name: SkuMeter
description: Name of the usage meter or SKU unit that has a defined price. Not applicable for one-time purchases.

name: SkuPriceDetails
description: Additional properties of the SKU's price (JSON object) common to all instances of that SkuPriceId (pricing metadata).

name: SkuPriceId
description: Unique identifier for the specific price rate used to calculate this charge.

name: Tags
description: Key-value tags associated with the resource for cost allocation and grouping. Includes user-defined and provider-defined tags (JSON object).

name: x_SourceSystem
description: [Extension] System that generated the record. Examples: 'gcp_billing', 'saas_subscription_pipeline', 'openai_usage', 'manual_import'.

name: x_SourceRecordId
description: [Extension] Unique identifier in the source system for traceability and deduplication.

name: x_AmortizationClass
description: [Extension] Amortization status. Values: 'Amortized', 'Non-Amortized', 'Prorated'. Indicates cost spreading method.

name: x_ServiceModel
description: [Extension] Service delivery model. Values: 'IaaS', 'PaaS', 'SaaS', 'FaaS', 'LLM-API'. Maps to cloud service taxonomy.

name: x_CostAllocationKey
description: [Extension] Key used for cost allocation to business units or cost centers.

name: x_ExchangeRateUsed
description: [Extension] Exchange rate applied when converting from PricingCurrency to BillingCurrency.

name: x_OriginalCurrency
description: [Extension] Original currency before conversion (for audit trail in multi-currency orgs).

name: x_OriginalCost
description: [Extension] Original cost amount before currency conversion (for historical accuracy).

name: x_UpdatedAt
description: [Extension] Timestamp when the record was last created or updated in the data warehouse.

name: x_OrgSlug
description: [Extension] Organization slug (tenant identifier). Redundant with SubAccountId but included for clarity in multi-tenant queries.

name: x_OrgName
description: [Extension] Organization display name from org_profiles. Human-readable tenant name.

name: x_OrgOwnerEmail
description: [Extension] Primary admin email for the organization. Used for billing contact and notifications.

name: x_OrgDefaultCurrency
description: [Extension] Organization's default currency from org_profiles (ISO 4217). Used for currency conversion validation.

name: x_OrgDefaultTimezone
description: [Extension] Organization's default timezone from org_profiles (IANA). Used for period boundary calculations.

name: x_OrgDefaultCountry
description: [Extension] Organization's default country from org_profiles (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2). Used for tax and compliance.

name: x_OrgSubscriptionPlan
description: [Extension] Organization's subscription plan (FREE, STARTER, PRO, ENTERPRISE). Affects quota limits.

name: x_OrgSubscriptionStatus
description: [Extension] Organization's subscription status (ACTIVE, TRIAL, SUSPENDED, CANCELLED). Affects pipeline execution.

name: x_PipelineId
description: [Extension] Pipeline ID that generated this record. Used for lineage and debugging.

name: x_PipelineRunId
description: [Extension] Specific pipeline run ID from org_meta_pipeline_runs. Used for audit trail.

name: x_DataQualityScore
description: [Extension] Data quality score (0.0 to 1.0) from DQ validation. Higher is better.

name: x_CreatedAt
description: [Extension] Timestamp when the record was first created in the data warehouse.

name: x_HierarchyDeptId
description: [Extension] Reference to org_hierarchy department entity_id for cost allocation.

name: x_HierarchyDeptName
description: [Extension] Department name for reporting (denormalized from org_hierarchy).

name: x_HierarchyProjectId
description: [Extension] Reference to org_hierarchy project entity_id for cost allocation.

name: x_HierarchyProjectName
description: [Extension] Project name for reporting (denormalized from org_hierarchy).

name: x_HierarchyTeamId
description: [Extension] Reference to org_hierarchy team entity_id for cost allocation.

name: x_HierarchyTeamName
description: [Extension] Team name for reporting (denormalized from org_hierarchy).
